verses.text: And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, and \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* ye afar \w off|strong="H7350"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* alone shall come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but they shall not come \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w*; neither shall the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with him.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w told|strong="H5608"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and all the \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, All the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* will we \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* under the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, and twelve \w pillars|strong="H4676"\w*, according to the \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* young \w men|strong="H5288"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* of \w oxen|strong="H6499"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* in \w basons|strong="H0101"\w*; and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* he \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in the \w audience|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, All that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* will we \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, and be \w obedient|strong="H8085"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* \add it\add* on the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with you concerning all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

¶ Then went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, and \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \add there was\add* under his \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* as it were a \w paved|strong="H3840"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of a sapphire \w stone|strong="H5601"\w*, and as it were the \w body|strong="H6106"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* in \add his\add* \w clearness|strong="H2892"\w*.

And upon the \w nobles|strong="H0678"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* he \w laid|strong="H7971"\w* not his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: also they \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to me into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and be there: and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* of \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and a \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I have \w written|strong="H3789"\w*; that thou mayest \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* them.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and his \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, \w Tarry|strong="H3427"\w* ye \w here|strong="H2088"\w* for us, until we come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto you: and, behold, \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w* \add are\add* with you: if \w any|strong="H4310"\w* \w man|strong="H1167"\w* have any \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* to \w do|strong="H1167"\w*, let him \w come|strong="H5066"\w* unto them.
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

And the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w abode|strong="H7931"\w* upon \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, and the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* it \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: and the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he \w called|strong="H7121"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* out of the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*.

And the \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add was\add* like \w devouring|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* on the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, and gat him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* was in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*.
